comments.body: It is a minor thing but you don't really need this comment. (We try to keep the recipes on conda-forge more-or-less consistent with each other and adding comments only on things that break that consistency.)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@  summary: 'An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python'

  # The remaining entries in this section are optional, but recommended
  description: |
    Plotly's Python graphing library makes interactive,
